titles: Orders set downe by the court of Lord Mayor and Aldermen of the city of London, concerning the rates of carriages with carrs within this city and the liberties thereof, to continue untill further order be taken in that behalf.
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor's Court
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
